name: Cael's fiancée
content:
An Alderaanian woman was the fiancée of the Limmie player Cael of House Hanarist. The fiancée, a charming woman, was a member of one of the Alderaan Noble Houses. In 0 BBY, their homeworld was destroyed by the Galactic Empire's superweapon the Death Star, causing Cael to renounce his sport and become a soldier for the Rebel Alliance.
The fiancée was mentioned in Cael's Character Folio included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
